TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypedAsyncResult`1<T> extends System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult

Docs.summary: A concrete implementation of that will wrap the result and return it when the method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object state) cil managed

Docs.param: A user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has a state object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use this constructor if your <xref:System.IdentityModel.TypedAsyncResult%601> instance does not need a callback delegate.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed

Docs.param: The method to be called when the asynchronous operation completes.
A user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has a callback delegate and a state object.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Complete (T result, bool completedSynchronously);
.method public hidebysig instance void Complete(!T result, bool completedSynchronously) cil managed

Docs.param: if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously; otherwise .
Docs.summary: Call this version of complete when your asynchronous operation is complete and no exception was encountered. It updates the state of the operation and notifies the callback.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Complete (T result, bool completedSynchronously, Exception exception);
.method public hidebysig instance void Complete(!T result, bool completedSynchronously, class System.Exception exception) cil managed

Docs.param: if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously; otherwise .
The exception that occurred during the processing of the asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: Call this version of complete if you raise an exception during processing. In addition to notifying the callback, it captures the exception and stores it to be thrown during the call to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig !T End(class System.IAsyncResult result) cil managed

Docs.param: The representing the status of an asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: End should be called when the End function for the asynchronous operation is complete. It ensures the asynchronous operation is complete, and does some common validation.
Docs.returns: The typed result of the asynchronous operation.

Docs.summary: Gets the typed result of the completed asynchronous operation.
Docs.value: The typed result of the completed asynchronous operation.
